name: Stray Souls 2: Stolen Memories - Collector's Edition
summary: In Stray Souls - Stolen Memories, the nerve-wrecking sequel to the hit hidden object game, you continue the search for your missing husband - and your daughter… Your husband took her - but why did he do it, and where did he take her? Discover secrets from a past your husband would rather stay hidden, in Stray Souls - Stolen Memories today!
